General.Name: AFT Pharmaceuticals Ltd
General.Description: AFT Pharmaceuticals Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of pharmaceutical products in New Zealand, Australia, Asia, and internationally. It offers products for use in the areas of allergy, cold and flu, digestive health, eye care, first aid, nail care, oral care, pain management, skin care, and supplements, as well as other products. AFT Pharmaceuticals Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

1.Name: Ms. Marree  Atkinson
1.Title: Co-Founder, Chief of Staff & Exec. Director
